alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 5:23AM AKST until February 24 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches on St. Lawrence Island, and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch for the Bering Strait Coast are expected. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until noon Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph on St. Lawrence Island will cause blizzard conditions at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
